meaningMnemonic: <kanji> Congratulations</kanji> on your <kanji>condition</kanji>. I'll send you a <vocabulary>greeting card</vocabulary> to make it official. Though this kind of card is almost always in the form of a <vocabulary>New Year's Card</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
